title: Favourites
label: [Label(name="enhancement"), Label(name="feature request")]
body: Can we add packages to favourites so we can install later when at home?

title: Ideia: Notificar pacotes acompanhados
body: Por favor, acrescentar a opção acompanhar pacotes, e ser notificado pelo app de uma nova versão.

title: Default repositories for Arch-based distros
label: [Label(name="invalid")]
body: I know the name of this app is AURdroid, but have you considered also adding support for some default repositories on popular Arch-based distros (such as Arch Linux itself, Manjaro and Antegros)?

title: F-Droid Inclusion
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
I'd like to add this app to F-Droid, and one requirement is this:

> The original app author has been notified (and supports the inclusion).

Would you support the inclusion?
